title: Shadow's Fall
description: "Everyone breaks.Everyone.It is a universal truth, an absolute with no exceptions.The only difference between us is how we break . . . and what it turns us into.This is one such story. And this will take some telling."~Enter the world of the Shadow Series where Light battles Dark and nothing is as it seems.Violet Archer knows that something is coming. She just doesn't know what . . . or who. And, oh boy, is she ever in for it.She will need to battle the Darkness--all which surrounds her--as well as all which lies within.And while she knows her heart, it will be tested: left behind by one man, pursued by another.She believes she is the hero of her story, but Violet is about to learn that some heroes become villains.***Adult novel. Contains mature and explicit content.***
author: T.M. Hart
